benefits.title: Fully Remote
benefits.text: We hire globally. We believe you can do your best work from anywhere. There are no Paybill offices, but we provide a co-working membership that you can use anywhere in the world.

benefits.title: Tech Allowance
benefits.text: Use this budget for any technology you need for your work setup.

benefits.title: Annual Off-Sites
benefits.text: We believe in the value of in-person time, so we all come together annually for a week. Each year we pick somewhere different in the world. It's a highlight of the year!

benefits.title: Flexible Work
benefits.text: Work remotely from anywhere in the world. We work in teams, but we work asynchronously. You know what you need to do and when it needs to be done.
